title: How can I use my SD card in the Mate7 Gold, while using two SIM cards?
answer: You cannot use a SD card, while you are using the Mate7 Gold as a dual-sim handset. The reason being, the SD card slot/tray in the Mate7 Gold doubles as a Nano-SIM tray, only allowing one to be used at a time. The primary SIM-tray (micro SIM) is not affected by this.
